IMI Kab Bogor Kawal Kepulangan Jenazah Afridza Munandar
04 Nov 2019, 17:12 by Anggi Tiar


IMI Kab Bogor Kawal Kepulangan Jenazah Afridza Munandar

KBRN, Tasikmalaya : Ikatan Motor Indonesia (IMI) Koordinator Wilayah (Korwil) Kabupaten Bogor terus mengawal kepulangan jenazah Afrizhasyah Munandar (20) dari Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.Rencananya, jenazah Afridza sudah diterbangkan dari Kuala Lumpur International Airpot (KLIA), Malaysia sejak pukul 12.50 waktu setempat. Dan diperkirakan jenazah bakal tiba di rumah pukul 20.00 WIB malam ini. "Jenazah terkonfirmasi di terbangkan dari Kuala Lumpur menggunakan Pesawat Garuda Indonesia nomor penerbangan GA-821 sekitar pukul 12.50 Waktu setempat ke Cargo Bandara International Soekarno Hatta, lanjut di bawa ke Rumah Duka lewat Jalur Darat diperkirakan tiba pukul 20.00 WIB," ujar Bendahara Umum IMI Korwil Kabupaten Bogor, Senin (4/11/2019). Lebih lanjut, Susilo sendiri mengaku bahwa dirinya bersama sekretaris IMI Korwil Kabupaten Bogor, Dudih Mulyadi masih berada di rumah duka yang berlokasi di Perum Tamansari Indah Blok D9, Kawalu, Kota Tasikmalaya, Jawa Barat menunggu kedatangan jenazah. "Saya beserta Sekretaris IMI Korwil Kab Bogor masih dirumah duka Perum Tamansari Indah, Kota Tasikmalaya. Kami bertemu ayahanda dan Ibunda Afridza. Beliau mengucapkan Terima Kasih yang sebesar-besarnya kepada seluruh masyarakat Kabupaten Bogor, mohon di maafkan jika ada kesalahan dan kealpaan almarhum," jelas pria yang akrab disapa Tomo itu. Tomo mengatakan, jenazah Afridza akan langsung dimakamkan setibanya di rumah duka. Jenazah Afridza rencananya dimakamkan di Pemakaman Sombong Bencoy, Jl Perintis Kemerdekaan No. 126, Kawalu, Tasikmalaya. "Permintaan  pihak keluarga malam ini juga, jenazhah akan langsung dimakamkan setelah di disholatkan," tuntasnya. Sebagaimana diketahui, Afridza Munandar merupakan pembalap Indonesia yang meninggal dunia setelah kecelakaan saat balapan di Asia Talent Cup (ATC) Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang, Sabtu (2/11/2019) kemarin. Afridza dikabarkan mengalami insiden kecelakaan di tikungan 10 sirkuit Sepang. Meski sempat mendapatkan perawatan intensif di rumah sakit Kuala Lumpur Hospital, namun nyawa Afridza tetap tidak tertolong.

IMI Bogor District Guard Afridza Munandar's Body Returns
Nov 04 2019, 17:12 by Anggi Tiar


IMI Bogor District Guard Afridza Munandar's Body Returns

KBRN, Tasikmalaya: Indonesian Motor Association (IMI) Regional Coordinator (Korwil) Bogor Regency continues to oversee the return of Afrizhasyah Munandar's body (20) from Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. The plan, Afridza's body has been flown from Kuala Lumpur International Airpot (KLIA), Malaysia since at the time of 12.50 local time. And it is estimated that the body will arrive home at 20.00 WIB tonight. "The confirmed body was flown from Kuala Lumpur using Garuda Indonesia flight GA-821 flight number around 12.50 local time to Cargo Soekarno Hatta International Airport, continued to be taken to the Funeral Home via Land Line is expected to arrive at 20:00 WIB," said IMI Korwil General Bogor Regency, Monday (11/04/2019). Furthermore, Susilo himself admitted that he and the IMI secretary of the Bogor Regency Korwil, Dudih Mulyadi were still in a funeral home located in Perum Tamansari Indah Blok D9, Kawalu, Tasikmalaya City, West Java, awaiting the arrival of the body. "I and the IMI Secretary of the Bogor Regency Korwil are still at the funeral home of Tamansari Indah, Tasikmalaya City. We met my father and mother Afridza. He expressed his deepest gratitude to all the people of Bogor Regency, please forgive me if there are mistakes and omissions of the deceased," clearly the man who is familiarly called Tomo. Tomo said, Afridza's body would be buried immediately upon arrival at the funeral home. It is planned that Afridza's body will be buried in the Sombong Bencoy Cemetery, Jl Perintis Kemerdekaan No. 126, Kawalu, Tasikmalaya. "Requesting the family tonight, the body will be buried immediately after being prosecuted," he finished. As is known, Afridza Munandar is an Indonesian racer who died after an accident during the race at the Asia Talent Cup (ATC) Malaysia at the Sepang Circuit, Saturday (11/2/2019) yesterday. Afridza reportedly suffered an accident incident at turn 10 of the Sepang circuit. Although he had received intensive care at the Kuala Lumpur Hospital, Afridza's life remained beyond help.
